sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>global.TransferOrderLineTaskUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access/>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>TransferOrderLineTaskUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[var TransferOrderLineTaskUtils = Class.create();
TransferOrderLineTaskUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {
    },

	/*
 	* Description: Used as RefQual for Vendor list in Transfer Order Line Task for Ship,
 	* return Campany list with vendor = true filter
  	*/
	getVendorList : function() {
		
		var coreCompany = new GlideRecord('core_company');
        	coreCompany.addQuery('vendor', true);
		coreCompany.query();
		var result = [];
		while (coreCompany.next()){
		    result.push(coreCompany.sys_id.toString());
		}
		var strQuery = "sys_idIN";
		if (result.length > 0)
		    return strQuery + result.join(",");
		else
		    return strQuery + null;
	},
	
    type: 'TransferOrderLineTaskUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2019-03-13 23:19:40</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>551edaabcd003300964f4c1f02f499b2</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>13</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>TransferOrderLineTaskUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Asset Management" source="com.snc.asset_management">0ea009c76d2620100acb70b353433049</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_551edaabcd003300964f4c1f02f499b2</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2019-03-13 23:59:27</sys_updated_on>
        <u_script_length>713</u_script_length>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
